name: Escape from the 9th Floor
description:
F to interact with doors

WASD to move

SPACE to jump

Pay attention to the number on the keys you pick up since there will be a room somewhere with the same number.

Your goal is to open the elevator and leave the floor you're on.

We would appreciate if you took the time to fill out a survey after completing the game

Link to survey: https://forms.gle/czQEy53mvrpKPYrz7
